sheet_title: Structural Notes (Nailing Schedule, Mechanical Anchors, Structural Wood)
description: Continuation of structural notes featuring a comprehensive nailing schedule for all framing connections, mechanical and adhesive anchor specifications with testing requirements (10% proof test, 24-hour minimum cure), and structural wood specifications including DFL lumber grades, pressure-treated wood requirements, engineered wood products (Parallam PSL, TJI joists), and Simpson Strong-Tie hardware references.
key_content: Nailing schedule: joist to sill 3-16d, sole plate to joist 16d @ 16" O.C., stud to sole plate 3-8d or 2-16d
Nailing schedule: doubled top plates 16d @ 16" O.C., double top plate lap splice 8-16d
Nailing schedule: rafter to plate 2-16d, rafter to ridge 3-16d
Nailing schedule: rim joist to top plate 8d @ 6" O.C.
Nailing schedule: built-up corner studs 16d @ 24" O.C.
Lumber: DFL No. 2 (2x6 & under), No. 1 all others; Select Structural (4x4+)
Pressure-treated sill plates: CCA-C or ACQ-D, AWPA U1 retention
Fasteners in PT wood: hot-dipped galvanized, stainless steel, silicon bronze, or copper
Adhesive anchors: ASTM A-325 threaded rods, ASTM A-563 Grade A nuts, ASTM F-436 washers
Anchor proof testing: 10% of all anchors, no sooner than 24 hours after installation
Engineered wood: Parallam PSL by Weyerhaeuser (ICC-ESR-1387, LARR 25020)
Engineered wood: TJI joists by Weyerhaeuser
Engineered wood: TimberStrand LSL by Weyerhaeuser
Simpson Strong-Tie hardware (LARR25719 Simpson Strong Walls, LARR25725)
Wood moisture content max 19% at time of placing

drawing_zones.content: Nailing Schedule (1) table with all framing connection types and nail specs, plus toe nail installation detail diagram
Mechanical and Adhesive Anchors specifications (11 items) including testing and installation requirements
Structural Wood specifications: lumber grades (DFL), pressure-treated requirements, plywood/sheathing, engineered wood products (PSL, TJI, LSL), Simpson hardware references
